text:
Feedback: blog content module edit post/listing template area has horizontal scrolling issue.

I’d fix it through the tweaks functionality in the extension but really it’s an issue better fixed by HS staff
It will be more like a mega menu
then your best option is HubDB for sure. Otherwise it will take alot of JS to build something like that out using the standard advanced menu
is there a way to push a change in an image module that was not locked previously?

we need to change an image in every single email that used a single template but when it was originally built it was an unlocked image module and now that we have locked and updated the image the majority of the emails still have the old image
You’re trying to change the default image?
I guess we could delete that module and re-add it
Yeah that’s probably what you’ll have to do. At least it’s on an email!
That can be a real pain if it’s on a zillion site pages.
thanks! Took me a second to see that solution
Anybody having issues with dragging and dropping modules in DM2? It was always a little laggy but now I can’t drag and drop in new modules or re-organize modules w/in the template.
I just did that without any issues

I noticed in the last few days that Color fields in modules are now showing an opacity field in the actual editor, when previously it was not. Is there a way to prevent it from appearing so that users can't adjust it unless we want them to?
I think it's okay to appear in the instance of image overlays but seems weird to display it when you are just asking the user to pick a font color or something.
